:::{.callout-tip appearance="default" title="Hint"}
When you're working on **HW2**, for <u>__Question 3.__</u> make sure to include the argument `encoding='ISO-8859-1'` in your `pd.read_csv()` call or else you'll encounter an error. The following code should be entered in the cell that includes the filename and encoding arguments as shown:

`df = pd.read_csv("apsc1001_cs1010_400mgml_flow.csv", encoding='ISO-8859-1')`
:::
